arts.ttl: Aston Villa 1-0 Bayern Munich: Player ratings as Duran stunner earns Villans victory
arts.sum: Villa held firm defensively but had Martinez to thank in the dying stages as he made two excellent saves to deny Gnabry and then Harry Kane, with the Argentine's impressive stops securing a memorable Champions League victory for the Villans. Bayern continued to have a stranglehold on possession and created a few half chances early doors, with Olise seeing two efforts blocked before Serge Gnabry's tame shot was comfortably held by Martinez.

arts.ttl: Ezri Konsa and Morgan Rogers left in awe of ¬£18m Aston Villa player in 1-0 win over Bayern Munich
Vincent Kompany backs up philosophy after Bayern Munich defeat
arts.sum: Bayern Munich suffered their first in the group/league phase of the Champions League, losing 1-0 at Aston Villa after going an incredible 41 games unbeaten. Despite the defeat, speaking to‚Ä¶

arts.ttl: Manuel Neuer pays tribute to Aston Villa star after Bayern win, he did 'very well'
arts.sum: Neuer was beaten by a stunning goal...

arts.ttl: Ex-Bayern Munich Chiefs Shares Major Update on Wirtz to Arsenal
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen midfielder Florian Wirtz is likely to join Real Madrid in the upcoming summer transfer window, despite Arsenal interest.

arts.ttl: Full Unai Emery press conference after Bayern victory as Aston Villa boss bursts with pride
arts.sum: Jhon Duran came off the bench to lob Manuel Neuer with just over 10 minutes left to play in the game to secure successive wins in the league phase having beaten BSC Young Boys last month. Unai Emery sat down with the media after Aston Villa's 1-0 win over Bayern Munich in the Champions League on Wednesday night.

arts.ttl: 'So many qualities': Kompany hails two Aston Villa stars, admits he tried to sign Emery's ¬£15m man
arts.sum: Villa stunned Bayern in the Champions League...

arts.ttl: Daily Schmankerl: The aftermath of Bayern Munich vs. Aston Villa in the Champions League; FC Barcelona seeking to reunite Hansi Flick with Jamal Musiala; RB Leipzig striker Benjamin ≈†e≈°ko getting a lot of interest; and MORE!
arts.sum: Lacking energy and solutions to Aston Villa ‚Äôs low block, Bayern Munich meandered through another game where it looked like it just could not figure out how to complete the task of getting a win. Bayern Munich looked completely disjointed early on to the point where Aston Villa asserted itself more in the match despite having far less possession through the first 25 minutes.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich exec Max Eberl laments lack of movement off the ball in Champions League defeat to Aston Villa
arts.sum: For the second match in a row, Bayern Munich faced a formidable opponent who sat deep in defense to narrow down Bayern‚Äôs attacking spaces. In the second half, we did better without creating any great scoring chances.

arts.ttl: ‚ÄúCalculated risk‚Äù fells Bayern Munich in 1-0 Champions League defeat to Aston Villa
arts.sum: When Aston Villa attacker Jhon Dur√°n freed himself from the defensive radius of Bayern Munich ‚Äôs Dayot Upamecano, the Colombian saw just enough daylight to unload his shot attempt over a prone ‚Äî and out of position ‚Äî Manuel Neuer, who had played ultra-aggressive all game with his positioning. Neuer‚Äôs ‚Äúlive by the sword, die by the sword‚Äù style has served him well over the years, just not during Bayern Munich‚Äôs 1-0 loss to Aston Villa in the Champions League .
